 HEIGHTS AND NATURAL FEATURES
                                               Surface heights are to the nearest metre above
 52    Ground survey height                    mean sea level. Where two heights are shown,
284    Air survey height                       the first is the height of the natural ground in the
                                               location of the triangulation pillar, and the second
                                               (in brackets) to a seperate point which is the
                Vertical face/cliff            highest natural summit.
